quote: I shoplifted. I was about five years old, and I took a candy from a store. We paid for three of them, but I took four, and I went home and cried. My mom took me back, and I paid for the missing piece.
name: Carrie-Anne Moss

quote: I had to take my makeup off at work every night. I wasn't allowed to do it at home because my mom said that when your work day is done, you're done with work.
name: Jodie Foster

quote: When you think of couponing, you picture a mom cutting coupons out of the back of the newspaper.
name: Andrew Mason

quote: I'm a military kid, both parents in the military - Mom did 12 years, Dad did 21, served in two wars. So discipline is something that was huge.
name: Robert Griffin III

quote: It's fun to play mom. Last I knew I was playing a 17-year-old who graduated.
name: Selma Blair

quote: I always say I am a realist, and my mom says, 'No, you just have anxiety.'
name: Jessica Chastain

quote: I wanted to perform well for my mom and dad, because in high school, I didn't have a job. My brothers, they worked at Pizza Hut or places like that, but sports, that was my way of giving back.
name: Junior Seau

quote: All of us kids ended up 'doing Mom.' There are four of us who've tried show business. Five if you insist on counting my sister the nun, who does liturgical dance.
name: Bill Murray

quote: I was class mom at the preschool one year and I was pretty much asked not to do that again!
name: Julie Bowen

quote: It was my mom and I against the world. We lived in New York in this bohemian lifestyle where an extended group of artists and photographers were like my aunts and uncles.
name: Brooke Shields

quote: My parents divorced when I was young but I was brought up in two really loving households. I didn't have a contentious relationship with my mom or dad.
name: Matt Damon

quote: Country was about character. Country's changed because of monsters like Clear Channel who bought up all the stations and sliced them up into formats. Our demographic is now the soccer mom.
name: Gary Allan

quote: I have lots of records, quite a collection, actually, that I stole from my mom. I have the original 'Thriller' album and I have a really great 'Elton John's Greatest Hits,' and I also have a N.E.R.D. album. Records sound more original. They have more edge.
name: Elisha Cuthbert

quote: My mom and dad worked very hard to give me the best chance in - not just in golf but in life. You know, I was an only child, you know, my dad worked three jobs at one stage. My mom worked night shifts in a factory.
name: Rory McIlroy

quote: Dad and mom would have preferred that I be a doctor, a lawyer, a scientist, or a great humanitarian.
name: Levon Helm

quote: I think a good mom is an awake mom. At least for me, I've always been a kinder, better person awake than sleep-deprived!
name: Lisa Loeb

quote: My mom was a great cook and great baker all her life.
name: Mandy Patinkin

quote: No, my mom kind of led me toward acting. She wanted to be an actress when she was younger. That made me interested in it when I was a kid, because she and I are very close.
name: Stephen Colbert

quote: For many women, going back to work a few months after having a baby is overwhelming and unmanageable. As strange as it may seem, things get even more difficult for a working mom after the second and third baby arrive. By that time, the romance of being a modern 'superwoman' wears off and reality sets in.
name: Mika Brzezinski

quote: One of my most sentimental items is my grandmother's engagement ring that my mom gave me a few years ago. It's a Victorian-style setting that's closed in the back, so it doesn't sparkle the way diamonds do now. I wear it as a pendant.
name: Georgina Chapman

quote: Once you're a mom, always a mom. It's like riding a bike, you never forget.
name: Taraji P. Henson

quote: My mom was always really healthy and cautious about her diet, so I'm not a big sugar guy.
name: Paul Walker

quote: My mom's hot. I mean she's old, but my mom's out of control.
name: Paul Walker

quote: We busted a lot of family secrets with this. But to make a long story short, my parents relationship was built heavily on security issues for my Mom, and when my Dad couldn't provide security, the relationship unraveled.
name: Kenny Loggins

quote: My mom took me to a Dolly Parton concert when I was 3.
name: Kat Dennings

quote: One time my mom tried to ground me, but that lasted 15 minutes.
name: Bam Margera

quote: OK, so my parents were married in 1955 and my mom knew my dad was gay and my dad knew he was gay and so I was, like, 'Why in the heck did you get married?' Like, what was going on? What was that time? It's like this crazy paradox that my whole life is based on, or my family's based on. So I spent a lot of time trying to understand '55.
name: Mike Mills

quote: My daughter's name is Neesyn Dacey but everyone calls her Dacey. Her mom chose Neesyn and I chose Dacey after she was born. The mother is a good friend of mine who I was seeing a while ago. We are no longer together.
name: Bode Miller

quote: My mom played the recorder. But not having electricity, we had minimal exposure to music. As I got a little older, we had Walkmans and things that were battery-powered, but it would have been nice to be growing up in the iPod era. A tape only has six songs on a side.
name: Bode Miller

quote: It's so funny looking back, but my so-called overnight success actually took 15 years. I remember when I didn't have any money, and my only car was mom's Hyundai.
name: Criss Angel

quote: As a small business owner for the last 15 years, when I think of what truly changed my life, it was my faith, a strong family, my mom did a really, really good job of encouraging me in very clear and discernible ways.
name: Tim Scott

quote: When you're sick, nobody takes care of you like your mom.
name: Trisha Yearwood

quote: We didn't have movies in this little mining town. When I was 12 my mom took me to New York and I saw Bye Bye Birdie, with people singing and dancing, and that was it.
name: Margot Kidder

quote: I gave guitar lessons. I tried to join bands. My mom always said it was obvious that nothing was going to stop me.
name: Janis Ian

quote: Before you're a mom you don't know what gear is going to be relevant.
name: Emily Procter

quote: My mom and my dad were married 56 years, and the fact that I reconciled with my dad I think made their marriage a little bit better as well.
name: Larry Elder

quote: I was embarrassed that I even wanted to become an actress because coming from L.A., with two older sisters in the business and a mom who had been a ballet dancer, it was such a cliche.
name: Elizabeth Olsen

quote: From the very start of all of this, my mom has read the scripts first. And if she liked something, she let me read it. She told our agent what kinds of parts that we would want.
name: Anna Chlumsky

quote: I had no idea of the size of my bank account as a teen, and I didn't care to know. That was my mom's job, I figured that I would just find out when I turned 18. If you can't trust your mom, then who can you trust?
name: Anna Chlumsky

quote: My mom, she's still always there for me. Always.
name: David Ortiz

quote: When I was growing up in New Jersey, my mom would regularly take my sister and I into the city to see shows. I have many fond memories of standing in the half-price ticket line in Times Square and going to matinees.
name: Trey Anastasio

quote: More and more couples are having this negotiation or discussion, but I'm still amazed at the number who aren't and where the cultural norm sort of kicks in and they just assume that mom's got to be the one who stays home, not dad.
name: James Levine

quote: My mom had started to go to work when I was nine or ten, so I was aware of women trying to find their own identities by working. But I was still influenced by men to such an extreme. I wanted to play their games and wanted to compete in their world and be like them.
name: Elisabeth Shue

quote: My mom had this romantic notion of her children playing classical music. The idea is you learn it when you're still learning language. It's using the same part of the brain.
name: Andrew Bird

quote: I burnt myself out of skating. I was ready to focus on being a mom.
name: Kristi Yamaguchi

quote: I've realized how precious life is. When I was younger, I was more adventurous. I felt invincible. I was game for everything. As a mom, I don't want to get injured because then I can't take care of my kids.
name: Kristi Yamaguchi

quote: I lived in small town out in the desert and my friend used to steal his mom's car in the middle of the night. He'd drive over to my house, I'd sneak out and we'd go out to the desert and just burn things down.
name: Mark Hoppus

quote: My mom's gonna be the biggest star - mark my words right now!
name: Vinny Guadagnino

quote: My house has always been like everyone's house. You walk in, you're a part of the family, no matter who you are, what celebrity status you are, everyone is treated the same - with love from my mom.
name: Vinny Guadagnino

quote: So, I remember when I was a kid, I was waiting for my mom to come home when she was working late, and, you know, I was like, 'Oh my God, what happened to her? Is she OK? Did something happen to her getting in the car?' I was a little kid. But those are actually early onsets of anxiety.
name: Vinny Guadagnino

quote: I got a family house for everybody to live in - my mom, my sisters and I. And I made sure that it has a separate apartment downstairs for myself. Family is more important than anything. We don't come from any money. So once I get them settled in, in a nice house, then I'll branch out and see if I can get something else.
name: Vinny Guadagnino

quote: My mom said, 'Don't get married. You're too young. Go out there and experience what life has to offer.' And I did.
name: Emmitt Smith

quote: I'm kind of lucky that we've finished shooting 'Cougar Town,' so I'm able to kind of just enjoy my pregnancy and be a stay-at-home mom and go to prenatal Pilates and do all that fun stuff that, if I were working, would be almost impossible to do.
name: Busy Philipps

quote: Birdie is amazing and such an incredible child and I'm having such a great time being a mom but I still want to have a career and I still look forward to auditions and parts, and when I don't get them I'm disappointed.
name: Busy Philipps

quote: I'm somebody who doesn't work with a stylist. I'll be honest with you, I'm a mom and it's just not something I want to put money toward because it's expensive to have somebody who helps dress you and I feel like I have to pay for preschool and so many things... so I don't have a stylist.
name: Busy Philipps

quote: Mom always tells me to celebrate everyone's uniqueness. I like the way that sounds.
name: Hilary Duff

quote: My mom taught me not to talk about money.
name: Hilary Duff

quote: I love my mom. I totally look up to her, and she just doesn't let anybody take advantage of me. People might call that a stage mom.
name: Hilary Duff

quote: My relationship with my mom is so amazing. We never got to have that stage that people go through, like when you're 13 and you think you're too cool for your parents. When you're embarrassed by them and stuff. We never went through that because I was constantly working and she constantly had to be there.
name: Hilary Duff

quote: My mom had me when she was 16, and I was an only child, which is probably why I received a lot of love and didn't miss that my father wasn't around.
name: Brett Ratner

quote: Miami Beach - that's where I grew up, in a middle-class Jewish family led by my maternal grandfather. Me, my great-grandmother - a Holocaust survivor, who was my roommate - my grandparents, my mom and her brother all shared a four-bedroom house.
name: Brett Ratner

quote: We didn't have a TV in the living room and all my friends thought we were kind of weird. When they'd come over, my mom wanted to talk to them about current events.
name: Eliza Dushku

quote: My mom is this liberal, feminist, Mormon powerhouse. I just love her to death.
name: Eliza Dushku

quote: I was raised in Boston by three older brothers and a very strong and empowering single mom.
name: Eliza Dushku

quote: My mom is like this hard-core, liberal feminist. She's a professor in Boston, and she's been teaching women's studies for 30 years and international politics.
name: Eliza Dushku

quote: As a mom, I don't have much time for beauty.

quote: My biggest project right now is trying to be a really great mom and learning how to balance family and career. I'm just trying to spend as much time with my family as I can.
name: Idina Menzel

quote: I'm a mom - I'm lucky if I get to shower in the morning. Luckily, nail polish stays on my toes. I've been so bad on the upkeep, though.

quote: I've always wanted to be a mom.

quote: I want my daughter to be proud of me and look up to me. I think early on in my pregnancy I realized that to be the mom I want to be, I had to change my life, and that's what I'm doing.

quote: My mom and dad played this music all the time when I was growing up, so to me songs by Jerry Lee and Fats Domino are the classics, they're the best songs ever.

quote: I was brought up as an only child, and we were very close. But when I was 14, we got evicted. We came home to a padlock, and I looked up at my mom and she was crying, and there was nothing to do.

quote: My mom has always said that if I get a big head, she'll take me out of this business as quickly as I got into it.

quote: I just got my phone back yesterday. My mom had it for two days. I was supposed to read a book and I really wanted to play Call Of Duty.
name: Chloe Moretz

quote: My mom won't let me buy high-fashion stuff unless it's TK Maxx or a birthday occasion.
name: Chloe Moretz

quote: The one thing my mom will let me get is a nice shoe sometimes.
name: Chloe Moretz

quote: My mom won't let anyone treat me like a little princess.
name: Chloe Moretz

quote: My brother Trevor is theatrically trained. I used to watch him when I was younger and I was in love with it. It just seemed really fun to be someone else. So I begged my mom she was hesitant, but she eventually allowed me. And it turned out well, I guess.
name: Chloe Moretz

quote: My mom gives me an allowance. She keeps me pretty tight-reined.
name: Chloe Moretz

quote: The problem with me is, anything that's easy I will just overdo it. Especially with clothes. But I'm 14 - my mom is super-strict about that.
name: Chloe Moretz

quote: We were poor. But my mom never accepted that. She worked hard to become a residential contractor - got her master's with honors at the University of New Orleans. I used to go to every class with her. Her father was my paternal figure.

quote: I've learned that every working mom is a superwoman.
name: Uma Thurman

quote: I'm an actress and mom, and I probably don't have enough of an active spiritual life. And I don't know why people run around calling themselves by the names of religions when they don't actually practise them.

quote: My mother was a single mom, and most of the women I know are strong.
name: Regina King

quote: I think I've become more like my mom just because of what we're both interested in, children and teaching and writing.

quote: I had always loved to write and my mom was my editor for my school papers.
name: Jenna Bush

quote: My mom's a secret Rastafarian.
name: Jenna Bush

quote: I'm more like my father, personality-wise. But my mom and I get alone really well - obviously, because my mom and my dad get along so well.
name: Jenna Bush

quote: I'm sure there were times when I wish I had thought, 'Gosh, that might really embarrass mom and dad,' but our parents didn't raise us to think about them. quote: I prefer to imagine that my wife, a few friends, and occasionally my mom are the only ones who read what I do, though I realize that this is somewhat unrealistic.
name: Chris Ware

quote: When I was a kid, my mom used to run the vacuum cleaner, and the noise would bother me so much that I would run into the woods to calm down. I feel like that vacuum cleaner has been on since I moved to New York City.

quote: There's been times when I've had heartbreaking moments and I'm like, 'I can't believe you said that,' or 'I can't believe you did that'. quote: My mom would take me to restaurants, and the first thing I'd ask for would be a pen and a napkin, and I'd sketch shoes and shoes and shoes.
name: Alexander Wang

quote: My mom would put me in these preppy little suits and slick my hair to the side. I have these baby pictures of me where I'm this little preppy kid with a sweater tied around my neck.

quote: I was a hyper kid in school and the teacher suggested to my mom she needed to do something with me.

quote: I know that I'm getting the real deal with my mom. I know that she's telling it like it is. She's proud of me when I've earned it and she's disappointed in me when I've earn that. She's really my spectrum on where I am as a person.

quote: I had such a great mom and I know that I'd never be that mom. I wouldn't want to bring a child into this world unless I could be.

quote: Over the years my mom has become a self-taught Biblical scholar.

quote: My mom used to tell me: 'It's not what you weigh it's what you look like.'

quote: My mom and my father's birthday are on the same day.

quote: My mom was dying for me to write a book, she was my biggest advocate.

quote: Growing up, my mom was very strict about how I dressed and how I behaved, and I said to myself that I wasn't going to be like that. But now I know I'm going to be exactly like my mom. I'm going to be worse!

quote: Sure, my childhood was unusual. All these eccentric, wild people frequented our home: rock stars, drag queens, models, bikers, freaks. But I was not this little rich girl. My mom and I lived in an apartment.

quote: My mom's been married three times my dad has been married a lot. I didn't really see my dad that much.
name: Skeet Ulrich

quote: I want to make my music and be a happy woman, a good wife, a good mom and one day hopefully have a child of my own.

quote: My dad is a very quick-witted, sarcastic, dry, humorous guy, whereas my mom's very silly, and that side of the family is very musical.
name: Tim Heidecker

quote: Once my mom passed away, I have nobody to answer to. It's great.
name: Jessica Hahn

quote: My mom really instilled in me that I'm beautiful and I can do anything, and I echo that now with my own girls.

quote: I love kids and children, and I love being a mom.

quote: My mom was always the support. I can always go out to her and she'll always find the positive in things.

quote: My mom is great and I make sure that we pray together before every race. She helps me put everything in perspective and remind me of the real reason I run.

quote: I care so passionately about improving the quality of life for women and girls, not just here in the United States, but internationally as well. I am a single mom and I raised a daughter who is now a young adult.

quote: The fact that I'm very close with my past relationships is something I pride myself on. My mom is still close to her first husband. It's nice to be able to enjoy someone in a different form.

quote: I have to keep reminding myself that I am their mother. Sometimes we are sitting at home and I feel like we are waiting for our mom to come home.

quote: Our last jam session was this past Christmas. Dad played his harmonica, mom sang in English and Italian, and I played guitar. I'm so happy that we could share that musical experience for one last time.

quote: "My mom cooked pot roast with noodles and frozen vegetables. Or she'd make spaghetti or hot dogs, or heat up TV dinners. Before I started modeling at age 19, I was 5'8"" and weighed 165 pounds."

quote: My father still is a lawyer, and my mom was a teacher and then later a career counselor.
name: Steve Case

quote: I remember that at the beginning of the month, the kind of menus my mom and father would prepare for us would have fish, chicken. I remember that without a lot of food left, some of the best meals happened right there.

quote: Simon is cool. You know, it's different if you ever see him around his mom. He acts totally different.

quote: I want to make sure I continue to make good music that my mom and everybody around me can be proud of.

quote: I grew up in the '80s, and there was no bigger group than New Edition in R&ampB. I broke my piggy bank so me and my mom could go to a New Edition concert together.

quote: I'm from Tennessee. My mom lives in Nashville. I'm born and bred country. That's all I listen to.
name: Lucy Hale

quote: I've never had my brows done - I tweeze them myself. I used to watch my mom pluck her brows, that's how I learned.

quote: My mom is a sculptress.
name: P. J. Harvey

quote: My hero is Michelle Williams, who I grew close to when we did 'Meek's Cutoff.' She's an extraordinary actor and mom.

quote: When I look up and see a star, I know my mom is there. She's with me all the time. It's a powerful connection.

quote: My mom was an aesthetician and she went to beauty school back in the '60s. I just remember watching her do her makeup all the time. She always had her nails done, makeup on - her face was ready to go when she went out. I loved it.

quote: I grew up in a family of Republicans. And when I was 18 and registering to vote, my mom's only instruction was 'You just go in and pull the big Republican lever.' That's my welcome to adulthood. She's like, 'No, don't even read it. Just pull the Republican lever.

quote: My mom started smoking when she was 11. She went to the hill next door to try her first cigarette. She set the entire hill on fire, but it didn't deter her.

quote: My memory of my mom is a wine glass in one hand and a cigarette in the other. She was a runway fashion model, and she was quite a glamorous woman.

quote: I am blessed to have Mom and Dad.

quote: I was labeled a troublemaker, my mom an unfit mother, and I was not welcome anywhere.
name: Ryan White

quote: I think I'd be a great mom, honestly. I don't think I'll have any problem giving them all the love in the world. Discipline will be the hard part.

quote: My mom will make me walk the dogs or take out the trash when I go home.
name: Queen Latifah

quote: I am a single mom and I'm the breadwinner and I have to work and I have to do these things and that's just the way it is. I don't think my son even knows any different.
name: Charisma Carpenter

quote: Our parents are obviously proud, but they're still trying to get used to the fact that we're in a band. I have a feeling my mom would actually like One Direction if I wasn't in it!

quote: I am excited to rise today to support National Mom and Pop Business Owners Day. This celebration honors the husband and wife business owner teams whose work helps drive the economy and fuel job growth.
name: Melissa Bean

quote: I'm a nice, happily married wife and mom and I live in Connecticut.
name: Christine Baranski

quote: My dad was a golden gloves boxer in the Marine Corps, then a deputy sheriff. My mom worked as an office assistant.
name: Susana Martinez

quote: My mom was a model. She had me at 20, so she was a young mother.
name: Michael Kors

quote: My mom and dad met at UCLA when he as a captain in the Air Force and she was in her junior year.
name: Tracy Austin

quote: I've always believed fitness is an entry point to help you build that happier, healthier life. When your health is strong, you're capable of taking risks. You'll feel more confident to ask for the promotion. You'll have more energy to be a better mom. You'll feel more deserving of love.
name: Jillian Michaels

quote: My dad left when I was 3 1/2, and he left my mom and I.
name: David Cassidy

quote: My mom used to take me down to the Jersey Shore when I was 7, 8, 9 years old. I can remember being down in that area - Belmar, Seaside Heights, Asbury Park and all those places that I went back and revisited.

quote: Some of the best times I've spent in Colorado have been in the backcountry with my mom and siblings, and more recently, with my own kids. That is why I'm concerned to see today's kids spending more time browsing the Internet than exploring nature.

quote: I want to go to college to study journalism. I want to speak French fluently, to travel. My mom was a journalist and it's in my blood.

quote: I'm a full-time mom right now and a part-time actress.
name: Valerie Bertinelli

quote: I was a single mom that raised two bright, beautiful, and compassionate girls.
name: Connie Stevens

quote: I would go visit my mom on Sundays, and my brother was working on stuff. I'd go in there and sing a little melody, then we started working with words and the next thing you know it was just born organically without really trying.

quote: My dad's half-Lebanese, my mom is full Lebanese. I'm three-quarters Lebanese. Irish-Lebanese.

quote: Most young people haven't used their storytelling skills since they were 8 or 9 or 10 and wanted to persuade Mom and Dad to take them to the ball game.
name: Peter Guber

quote: My mom used to tell me stories at night, read books to me - and I read 'em over and over and over again. And you know what I learned from that? I went back and looked at everything - Why do I like reading the same stories over and over and over again? What, was I some kind of nincompoop? No - the narrative gave me connection with my mom.
name: Peter Guber

quote: Not that we didn't have close relationships with our parents - I'm very close to my mom - but parents didn't think anything of going off for a few weeks and leaving their kids.

quote: Mom and Dad would stay in bed on Sunday morning, but the kids would have to go to church.
name: Lynn Johnston

quote: Deep down, my mom had long suspected I was gay... Much of her anger and hurt came from her sense of betrayal that she was the last to be told.

quote: What mom cares about most is that I'm happy, healthy and enjoying my life.
name: Chaz Bono

quote: My daily schedule is quite hectic, but I have to put my health first in order to be the best mom and wife I can be.

quote: My mom can't defend herself to the world. She is such an amazing woman, with such an open heart. It's a real hard line, and I crossed it. quote: I've always been a writer because I've always been a student. My mom's a retired professor, so I come from a very academic background. I love writing, you know?
name: Kerry Washington

quote: My mom always encouraged me, it was never weird. She'd look at 'Heavy Metal' and go 'Woo-hoo!'

quote: You know, I loved math. My mom was a math teacher.
name: Joan Cusack

quote: My mom sang in high school choir and so did my father.
name: Kevin Richardson

quote: I also think a Hot Mom is someone who can connect with what's current in her kids' world.
name: Jami Gertz

quote: Being a working mom is not easy. You have to be willing to screw up at every level.
name: Jami Gertz

quote: As a mom, I always feel I have to protect them. I talk about them because they are the most important things in my life but they are private people. I won't use them for my own press.

quote: It's hard either way, at home or on the bus, I think the hardest thing probably for me is going one second from being mom to right out on the stage and having to be that person too. It's hard to switch gears.

quote: President Obama likes to talk about the Buffett Rule. Well, here's a Buffett Rule that all Americans should be able to support: mom and pop businesses should not pay a higher tax rate than Fortune 500 corporations like Warren Buffett's.

quote: But my mom was a pianist, and she taught piano out of her house. I was just so excited, being a little kid and having all these other kids come to my house twice a week. I thought it was a big party.
name: Vanessa Carlton

quote: My mom would give me a piece to play, but I wouldn't do any theory because when it came time to do it I would sneak back upstairs and watch TV. So, I had these kind of nonchalant lessons for years, then it just started soaking in.
name: Vanessa Carlton

quote: The real beauty of it - key to my life was playing key chords on a banjo. For somebody else it may be a golf club that mom and dad put in their hands or a baseball or ballet lessons. Real gift to give to me and put it in writing.

quote: I've changed my life in a lot of ways. I'm a mom, a wife, and a Christian. Some of the things I expressed in my early 20s aren't what I care to express right now.
name: Cheryl James

quote: My mom was a '70s mom. She paved a road that no one had yet walked.
name: Melissa Leo

quote: For me, just being how old I am, I know I don't want to be a single mom. I really would rather make it a two-person job. But I've also come to terms with not being a mother at all. I'm actually really good with either direction that my life can take as being a valid experience.

quote: My mom didn't use face cream, like, nothing at all. She's got great skin and looks very youthful.

quote: There's a book called 'The Shack' - it had a lot to do with me coming full circle, meeting my birth mother. Awhile back, my birth mom and my adopted mom came to my show together, and it was pretty surreal.
name: Rodney Atkins

quote: When you're adopted, no matter what, you've got issues with unconditional love. And you find out you're the product of the worst situation for a young girl to be in and start her life, and I'm so grateful that my birth mom made the decision she made. She came from a rough situation.
name: Rodney Atkins

quote: I was a sickly baby, and after two sets of adoptive parents took me home, they returned me to the orphanage because of a serious respiratory infection. name: Rodney Atkins

quote: Right now, it hasn't affected my music other than the fact that I don't have time to write any of it. That's no different from when I first started and I lived at home. I would play the guitar in the afternoon and then my mom or my dad would come home and I'd have to quit.

quote: My mom is many times responsible for getting us all together, but we trade off at each other's houses. My brother and I are actors and are traveling a lot of our job.
name: Beau Bridges

quote: I wanted to have a personal life that I fully inhabited, not because I am such a great mom, but for me.
name: Helen Hunt

quote: The most important thing in my father's life? World peace. Me and my brother. My mom.
name: Sean Lennon

quote: I've had Susan Sarandon play my mom, and now Lesley Ann Warren has played my mom, so if I could have Debra Winger play my mom, then I would have the trifecta of my favorite actresses playing my mother.
name: Jenna Fischer

quote: We always had 'Vogue' in our house. But, when I was around 12, my Mom finally took me seriously about modeling and put a stack of magazines in front of me, then told me to study all the poses. The ones I loved the most were in 'Vogue.'

quote: My goal is to be a household name, and when I do that, I want to help other girls become models, and maybe even launch a fashion line with my mom, like Beyonce did with her mother. My mom has such a good eye, and it's always been a dream of hers.

quote: When you're a mom and you have three children, nothing bothers you. Trust me. Who cares what people say? I've got other things to deal with.
name: Faith Hill

quote: My mom was a saint. She taught me to be terminally nice.
name: Iggy Pop

quote: I was who I was in high school in accordance with the rules of conduct for a normal person, like obeying your mom and dad. Then I got out of high school and moved out of the house, and I just started, for lack of a better term, running free.

quote: I was always a closet lover of acting. My mom was very practical. She never, ever restricted our dreams, always told us we could do or be anything. Then I said, 'Maybe I want to be an actor'. And she said, 'Maybe not that'.

quote: My mom is very Southern and she in real life says things like, 'If you've got it, flaunt it.'
name: Cheryl Hines

quote: Well, when I was a little girl we had 17 cats once. They all lived outside, and they kept having more kittens. My mom made us put little ribbons around each kitten's neck, put them in a wagon, and go door-to-door around the neighborhood to try to give them away.
name: Cheryl Hines

quote: I saw things at an early age because my mom was a theater actress. I did a play with her when I was 10 years old.
name: Sam Rockwell

quote: In Fargo, they say, well, that's a job. How well do you get paid? For example, for this book I was written about in Entertainment Weekly, and it was kind of cool because my mom asked me if Entertainment Weekly was a magazine or a newspaper.
name: Chuck Klosterman

quote: Mom was the one who taught me unconditional love. With Dad, I'd always felt there was something to live up to - expectations. But in the last year, we had a wonderful relationship.
name: Greg Louganis

quote: Growing up with three older brothers and being the youngest and the only girl, my mom always made me tough. She's taught me over the years how to be a strong, independent woman, how to carry yourself in a positive way and anything that my brothers can do, I can do.
name: Diana Lopez

quote: If I made a list of the people I admire, Mom would probably fill up half of it. She could do anything and everything.
name: Patsy Cline

quote: I always had a standard of, back when I was doing the country music I always told people I would never record a song that I wouldn't sit down and sing in front of my mom and dad.
name: Ricky Skaggs

quote: My mom did costumes for the Pointer Sisters.
name: Slash

quote: I was born in Corpus Christi, Texas, the youngest of four girls, including my oldest sister, Lisa, who has special needs. My mom was a special education teacher, and my dad worked on the Army base. We weren't wealthy, but we were determined to succeed.
